name: Jackson Cannon's Cold Spring Cocktail
description: This winter sour from Jackson Cannon balances a boozy cognac edge with smooth maple syrup and Meyer lemon. Though there's as much maple as lemon, it's not at all sweet, just warming and aromatic.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce freshly squeezed Meyer lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: Add cognac, lemon juice, maple syrup, and bitters to cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Meyer lemon twist.
